Your order may take up to 4 hours to process. You’ll change to your new plan once it has been processed.
Great! We've received your order.
We’ll send a confirmation email to jeman_hema@gmail.com

Key conditions



Endless data

Allocated data at max speed, then speeds reduce to a maximum of 1.2Mbps, this will impact your experience. No tethering or hotspots, unless you buy a Hotspot extra or if hotspot data is included in your plan.


Unlimited SMS NZ/AUS

Includes person-to-person text messages to NZ and Australia numbers only. Excludes MMS (e.g. picture messaging) and non-data video calling.


Hotspot

If you use Hotspot as an extra or as part of your plan, it counts towards your total data usage on your Endless Mobile plan. After max speed data allocation is used, speeds will reduce to a maximum of 1.2Mbps; this will impact your experience. Only one hotspot extra can be added per line per month.

Key conditions



Rollover Data

Capped at 3.5GB.


Rollover mins

Capped at 500 minutes.

Unlimited SMS

Includes person-to-person messages to NZ numbers only and excludes MMS (e.g. picture messaging) and non-data video calling.

Key conditions



Rollover data

Capped at 3.5GB.


Rollover talk

Capped at 500 minutes.


Endless data

Allocated data at max speed, then speeds reduce to a maximum of 1.2Mbps. This will impact your experience. No tethering or hotspots, unless you buy a Hotspot extra or if hotspot data is included in your plan.


Socialiser

Rollover is not applied to Socialiser data. This allocated data is to be used on Facebook, Messenger, Twitter and Spotify apps only. This won't affect your regular plan-based data.


Unlimited SMS NZ

Includes person-to-person messages to NZ numbers only. Excludes SMS to short codes, MMS (e.g. picture messaging) and non-data video calling.


Unlimited SMS NZ/AUS

Includes person-to-person messages to NZ numbers only. Excludes SMS to short codes, MMS (e.g. picture messaging) and non-data video calling.


Hotspot

If you use Hotspot as an extra or as part of your plan, it counts towards your total data use on your Prepaid Value Pack. Once your plan data allowance is used, you'll no longer be able to hotspot, unless you buy a Data Extra.

Key conditions



Rollover data

Capped at 3.5GB.


Socialiser

Rollover is not applied to Socialiser data. This allocated data is to be used on Facebook, Messenger, Twitter and Spotify apps only. This won’t affect your regular plan-based data.

Spark Voicemail App


Visual Voicemail allows you to hear and read your voicemail messages.

You can still use the traditional voice prompted voicemail. Any change you make in the app, is made in the traditional voicemail.

Learn more about Spark
Voicemail App

Companions



Companions receive 40GB data at max speed, then Endless data at reduced speed*.

Companions get 50% off Spotify Premium.

Add your Companions through MySpark:

  1. Login to MySparK
  2. Select the number with the $99.99 Endless Group plan.
  3. Select Add Companion.

Learn more about Companions
